tool_description: Analyzes the complete knowledge base content structure, categorizing articles by type, topic, creation date, last modified date, author, and content complexity metrics.

kb_source_path.description: Path or identifier for the knowledge base source

include_metadata.description: Whether to include detailed metadata analysis

analyze_content_complexity.description: Whether to perform content complexity analysis

error_messages: Invalid source path: Knowledge base source not found or inaccessible
Empty content types: At least one content type must be specified
Analysis failed: Unable to process knowledge base content structure
usage: Provide kb_source_path to analyze content inventory. Optionally specify content_types array, enable metadata analysis, and content complexity scoring.

total_articles.description: Total number of articles in the knowledge base

creation_dates.description: Article creation dates in ISO format

last_modified_dates.description: Last modification dates in ISO format
